    HYP: the Tigers and Twins will play a third mutual game at Target Field on Wednesday .


  2966. REF: Norris ( 2-2 , 4.43 ERA ) will oppose Minnesota RHP Ervin Santana ( 5-4 , 4.73 ERA ) .

    HYP: against Norris ( 2-2 , 4.43 ERA ) , Minnesota left pitcher Ervin Santana ( 5-4 , 4.73 ERA ) .


  2967. REF: Xi urges to open economy wider to world

    HYP: Xi calls for opening economy to wider world


  2968. REF: the economy must open wider to the outside world to fuel growth , President Xi Jinping told a group tasked with steering reform on Tuesday .

    HYP: it is imperative to open up the economy to the wider world for boosting growth , said President Xi Jinping 's group , whose job is Tuesday 's governance reform .


  2969. REF: `` China should be committed to attracting foreign investment and expertise , and improve opening-up policies , '' he said , addressing the 16th Meeting of the Central Leading Group for Deepening Overall Reform .

    HYP: `` China should engage in attracting foreign investment and expertise and improve open policies , '' he said on the 16th session of the group 's central leadership group to deepen overall reform .


  2970. REF: promoting opening up while pushing forward reforms will add new impetus and vitality , and provide new room for economic growth , Xi said .

    HYP: promoting the opening in rotating reforms will deliver new impetus and vitality , it will also provide a new scope for economic growth , Xi says .


  2971. REF: the leading group adopted a series of guidelines including a negative list regulating market access , relaxation of border-control policies , encouraging state-owned enterprises ( SOE ) to absorb private capital and overhauling the resident registration system .

    HYP: the leading group has adopted a number of directives , including a negative list of regulatory access to the market , the relaxation of border control policies , support for state-owned enterprises ( SOEs ) to absorb private capital and the reorganisation of the registration residency system .


  2972. REF: according to the statement , a negative list , identifying sectors and businesses that are off-limits for investment , will be drawn up .

    HYP: in a statement , a negative list is set to identify sectors and businesses that are off limits for investment .


  2973. REF: the system will be gradually tested and improved through trial programs .

    HYP: this system will be gradually tried and improved through test programmes .


  2974. REF: the move is significant as it will give the market a bigger role in allocating resources , ensuring a law-based business environment and making the market more open , the statement said .

    HYP: this move is significant because it will give the market a greater role in resource allocation , ensuring the legal business environment and making the market more open , the statement says .


  2975. REF: the government will also loosen controls on the powers it delegates to companies , making sure that companies decide how to run their businesses .

    HYP: the government will also release controls on the powers that delegate to firms , and make sure the companies themselves decide how to manage their business .


  2976. REF: the statement also said China will allow border areas to explore new models of cross-border economic cooperation and new mechanisms for promoting regional growth .

    HYP: the statement also indicates that China will allow border regions to discover new models of cross-border economic cooperation and new mechanisms for promoting regional growth .


  2977. REF: in a bid to open up state-controlled sectors , more areas will be open to private investment .

    HYP: in an attempt to open state-controlled sectors , more areas will be open to private investment .


  2978. REF: `` The government will not change its policy toward foreign investment , and will protect the lawful interests of foreign-funded companies and provide better services for them , '' said the statement .

    HYP: `` The government will not change its policy towards foreign investment and will protect the legal interests of companies funded from abroad and will provide better services to them , '' it says in a statement .


  2979. REF: in addition , it will be made easier for foreigners to apply for permanent residence permits , or `` green card , '' by optimizing requirements and streamlining the application process .

    HYP: in addition , it will be easier for foreigners to apply for a permanent residence permit or a `` green card , '' by optimising the requirements and simplifying the application process .


  2980. REF: guaranteeing lawyers ' right to practice and nurturing professional judges and prosecutors were also discussed at a meeting .

    HYP: ensuring rights advocates practice and develop a professional judge and a prosecutor has also been discussed at the meeting .


  2981. REF: the meeting was also attended by Premier Li Keqiang , and senior leaders Liu Yunshan and Zhang Gaoli , according to a statement released after the meeting .

    HYP: Premier Li Keqiang and the leaders of Liu Yunshan and Zhang Gaoli also attended the meeting , according to a statement issued after the meeting .


  2982. REF: more hospital beds possible in Karlovy Vary Region

    HYP: there may be a new berth in the Karlovar region .


  2983. REF: according to deputy governor of the Karlovy Vary Region Jakub Pnik ( SSD ) , the current bed capacity of two regional hospitals and two private hospitals in the region is sufficient and partial modifications should be implemented on the basis of agreements between the departments of individual hospitals .

    HYP: according to the Deputy Governor of Karlovar County , Jakuba Pnik ( SSD ) , the current capacity of the two regional hospitals and two private hospitals in the country is sufficient and the sub-arrangements should be made on the basis of an agreement between the separate hospitals .


  2984. REF: however , in the region there are options for expanding the care offered .

    HYP: but there are also opportunities for expansion of care .


  2985. REF: for example , single-day surgery centres for the performance of procedures not requiring hospital stays of longer than 24 hours could be set up in surgical units .

    HYP: for example , in the surgical ward ward , there could be centres of one-day surgery , where surgical courses would be performed according to a set design , which do not require hospitalisation for more than 24 hours .


  2986. REF: it is not yet clear in which specific hospitals single-day surgery centres could be set up .

    HYP: in which particular hospitals the workplace for one-day surgery should be , it is not yet clear .


  2987. REF: the skin department of Karlovy Vary Hospital could see the creation of a laser centre with the option of using laser technology to treat skin disease .

    HYP: in Karlovy Vary , a laser centre could become a laser centre with the possibility of using laser technique on a skin condition .


  2988. REF: the concept also recommended the setup of an apallic centre for the treatment of patients with brain disease who are in a vegetative state .

    HYP: the concept also recommended the emergence of an apathetic centre that would take care of patients with disabilities of the brain who are in a vegetative state .


  2989. REF: such a centre would be centrally managed and should form an integral part of the Anaesthesiology and Resuscitation department .

    HYP: such a centre should be established centrally and should be an integral part of the anaesthetist-resuscitation department .


  2990. REF: there is also the option of concentrating such a facility at Ostrov Hospital , where a similar facility already exists .

    HYP: there is also the possibility of concentrating such a facility to the Hospital Island , where such care exists .


  2991. REF: a further area where capacity seems insufficient are the after-care wards , and chiefly the Long-term Care Clinics ( LCC ) in Nejdek , whose capacity is insufficient and should primarily connect with acute care wards .

    HYP: additional beds , which appear to be inadequate in the Karlovar region , are beds of follow-up and , in particular , the beds of the long-term ( LDN ) , whose capacity in the Post is inadequate and , above all , should be closely related to acute care beds .


  2992. REF: the concept recommends that part of this facility function as a rehabilitation ward and part as a classic LCC ward .

    HYP: part of this facility should function as a bed of rehabilitation and part as a classic LDN bed , recommends the concept .


  2993. REF: as it notes , after-care wards are chiefly absent in Karlovy Vary Hospital ,

    HYP: as she points out , beds of subsequent care are missing mainly in the Karlovy Vary hospital .


  2994. REF: where buildings left empty following centralisation could be used .

    HYP: there , it could be used to leave buildings after centralisation .


  2995. REF: last but not least , the Karlovy Vary Region lacks social care wards focusing on the treatment of Alzheimer 's disease .

    HYP: last but not least in the Karlovar region absences social-health beds focusing on the treatment of Alzheimer 's disease .


  2996. REF: as there is a lack of such wards across the whole country , it could also serve other regions as an 'Alzheimer centre ' .

    HYP: these beds are scarce throughout the Republic , so it could serve for other counties as so-called Alzheimer 's .


  2997. REF: according to the recommendations , hospitals should prepare for the introduction of so-called follow-up wards that would be funded through European subsidies .

    HYP: according to the recommendations , hospitals should also be prepared to implement the so-called `` follow-up '' beds to be released by the financial means of European subsidies .


  2998. REF: `` These are beds that would follow on from super-specialised medical care fields and create space for the transfer of patients following , for example , a cardiological , neurological , transplantation or other procedure , '' states the regional concept for care wards .

    HYP: `` These are beds that will be based on supespecialized care and will create room for translation of patients following surgery , for example , after cardiochirurgical , neurosurgical , transplantation or other surgery , '' the regional concept of bed care is described .


  2999. REF: new services could also be offered in psychiatric care .

    HYP: new services could also be offered in the area of psychiatric care .
